p: Melting points have been obtained on a Büchi Melting PointB-540 apparatus which uncorrected and determined. 1H NMR spectra have been recorded on a Bruker Advance III instrument at 400 MHz. Chemical shifts ( δ) of NMR have been reported in parts per million ( ppm) units relative to internal standard (TMS). All reactions have been monitored by thin-layer chromatography (TLC), using silica gel plates (GF254) and UV light visualisation. Flash chromatography separations have been obtained on silica gel (200–300 mesh).
